entities.name: MICROSOFT
entities.description: Microsoft is a multinational technology company producing software, electronics, and personal computers. They are focused on making computing more personal, and have a range of products including Microsoft 365, Windows 10, and Windows 11.

entities.name: ZENIMAX MEDIA INC.
entities.description: ZeniMax Media Inc. is a parent company of Bethesda Softworks LLC, one of the largest, privately held game developers and publishers in the world. Acquired by Microsoft in March 2021.

entities.name: BETHESDA SOFTWORKS LLC
entities.description: Bethesda Softworks LLC is one of the largest, privately held game developers and publishers in the world, and a subsidiary of ZeniMax Media Inc.

relationships.relationship_description: Microsoft acquired ZeniMax Media Inc. in March 2021.
Bethesda Softworks LLC is a subsidiary of ZeniMax Media Inc.
Bethesda Softworks LLC is a subsidiary of ZeniMax Media Inc., which was acquired by Microsoft in March 2021.
